questions.Instruccion: Connect the two parts of the sentences

questions.question: She couldn't go to school yesterday
She loves visiting her grandparents
questions.answer: because they have a large yard

questions.question: He has a sore throat.
questions.answer: He should drink lemon juice and honey.

questions.question: He has a broken arm.
questions.answer: His mom should take him to the hospital.

questions.question: He has a stomachache.
questions.answer: He shouldn't eat so much chocolate.

questions.question: We use the past simple to talk about
questions.answer: experiences at some time in our lives up to now.

questions.question: We use the present perfect to talk about
questions.answer: finished actions that happened in the past.

questions.question: And what was Pele doing?
questions.answer: He was barking at the bottom of the tree.

questions.question: What did you do?
questions.answer: I put his leash on and tied him to another tree.
